#Dependencies
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r cars}
data.tb <- read_csv("./data/BlackFriday.csv")
data.tb %>% head(25)

```
#find unique values for Age
```{r}
unique(data.tb$Age)  
```

#functions to filter Ages into return values (numeric representations of the group)
```{r}
ageFilter <- function(age) {
  switch(age, "0-17"=0, "18-25"=1, "26-35"=3, "36-45"=4, "46-50"=5, "51-55"=6, "55+"=7)
}
ageFilter("0-17")
```
#pip Age vector into ageFilter(), append to tibble
```{r}
data.tb$Age %>% (ageFilter())
```

#Regression: Age vs Purchase Value
```{r}
fit <- lm(formula= data.tb$Purchase ~ data.tb$Age + 0, data=data.tb)
fit
```
#Correlation: Age vs Purchase Value
```{r}
cor(data.tb$Age %>% as.numeric(), data.tb$Purchase %>% as.numeric())
```

#find the kmeans
```{r}
km <- kmeans(data.tb, 10)
km 
```
